website_summaries.verdict: A glycerin-based shampoo for those looking for a natural alternative.
pros: Argan's shampoo is actually a mix of several oils, including peach kernel and camelia seed
Hair must absorb the shampoo for 2-3 minutes to achieve the full effect
Most users say a dime or quarter-sized amount of shampoo goes far
cons: Some complain about watery bottles – quality control may be an issue

customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for a couple years now and it has made my hair + scalp so healthy. My hair used to be so frizzy and pooffy after washing and I had very bad dandruff BUT now it is tamer and silky and my dandruff it practically gone. I pair it with the Silk18 conditioner on my hair ends. If you're looking for a more natural hair product I recommend this, I can really see and feel the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Argan oil shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo because I was looking for a sulfate-free shampoo without the harmful ingredients of many drugstore varieties, but also one that could clean my hair effectively. I think I found my new favorite shampoo brand. The only thing about this shampoo I didn't love was that it has no scent--I like for my shampoo to smell nice--but that would actually be a plus for many people, as it contains no irritating fragrances. Other Maple Holistics shampoos and conditioners do have good scents to them that are not artificial or irritating and I enjoy those as well. Overall I am excited to try more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It is possible that my experience was unique and I just got a bad batch made with rancid oil. It is possible that my experience
customer_reviews.text: I hope I just got a bad batch but this shampoo had a terrible smell of rancid oil. I tried to use it for a few times but I couldn't take the smell and had to throw it out. I hope you have a better experience and embed a better batch.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle R.

customer_reviews.title: A lush bar with cade oil was the best I had found and would only last 12-24 hours
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding a product that will keep my dry scalp from flaking everywhere. A lush bar with cade oil was the best I had found and would only last 12-24 hours. I was skeptical about the reviews on this product but I'm glad I bought it. I coupled this product with the Silk18 conditioner that is recommended in other reviews and one use of the combo keeps my scalp flake free for 72 hours. Guests who use my shower commented on how good it smells and makes their hair feel too.
customer_reviews.author: BuysFromAmazon

customer_reviews.title: changed the cindition of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. Since I've been using Argan oil shampoo, I find my itching dry scalp has stopped and my scalp and hair is a lot healthier and moisturized, considering how dry my hair and scalp was. I was skeptical at first but, I find this shampoo really works. Very satisfied and arrived on schedule. Cathy
customer_reviews.author: CATHY

customer_reviews.title: Great mild and natural product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over 4 years now. This is a great product that can be used daily. Does not smell bed or too strong, just right. It is good for color treated hair as well, I color mine and it does not disturb the color strength. I will continue to use this since I tried similar products on amazon but for sure this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Umair Mazhar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and very good quality. It is not necessary to use it many times to see a big difference in the hair. I have tried different types of shampoos and it never worked so well as with the argan shampoo, I believe that the ingredients must be really natural to be able to give that formula. It is amazing how shiny and soft my hair is now.
customer_reviews.author: roberto chirinos

customer_reviews.title: Great for dandruff.
customer_reviews.text: My husband really like this shampoo. I can’t really say that his hair is growing back but he’s also not loosing it fast. It has worked great for his dandruff and I always look for products that don’t have the bad junk in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Natural, simple and effective!
customer_reviews.text: This is the shampoo I had been searching for years! It is completely natural, perfect for keratin treated hair and leaves the hair light, shiny and manageable. My hair would be frizzy at times so I had to use a conditioner no matter what. With this shampoo, when I am in a hurry I can skip the conditioner and my hair is still smooth. Just a little bit goes a long way. Note: I saw other reviews mentioning that people give good reviews to this product because they offer a free product in return for a 'good review'. That is not correct. Give your Honest opinion... and my Honest opinion is that this shampoo is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Overrated, watery "shampoo"...
customer_reviews.text: Overrated. Do yourself a favor and save your money. If you think this is "good", then just go out and buy a bottle of something called "Cetaphil Gentle Cleanser". It will work just as well, and you'll save money, plus it doesn't have any "chemicals" (what a joke, EVERYTHING has "chemicals", think before you buy stuff, people) that you're so worried about. Worst "shampoo" (I hesitate to call it that) that we've ever used. Just awful stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I got a bad bottle or what
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is VERY VERY watery. It is hard to pour in my hand and make it to my hair without half of it oozing out. I don't know if I got a bad bottle or what, but it is the consistency of water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my hair when it is color treated and not color treated. I'm trying to trade in my conventional products for more natural products, sometimes the product is effective and sometimes it isn't. This is a good product. I shampoo, leave it in, and rinse when the rest of my showering is done. It conditions in this way because it gives the oils time to penetrate. I don't have time to spend on my hair much or even look in the mirror for more than a passing glance but my niece used this and her hair gleamed afterwards. It worked beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I found this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm the only person with thick and curly hair in my family. I had to figure out how to take care of it on my own, and it's been a long process. I've been experimenting with different things for over 10 years now, and the Argan Curling Defining Gel made my life so much easier. It tames down my frizz a bunch, and it offers great moisture to my curls throughout the day. I try to always keep a bottle on hand to make sure I wont accidentally run out even. It helped me figure out the hair regimen that would keep people complimenting me on my curls all the time and that feels pretty darn good!
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: I have soft hair
customer_reviews.text: I had used Nioxin for years and my hair was a mess. This has made my hair looking and feeling beautiful. I love the smell as I wash. I have struggled for years with my hair falling out. I always had enough left on my head but anywhere I went, my hair fell out and it has been so irritating. Now after using this product, Maple Holistics Argan Oil Shampoo, my hair loss is normal, just a little every morning when I groom. The rest of the day my hair is fine, not falling out. It looks shinny and soft and it is easy to care for.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Hair growth
customer_reviews.text: This product really helps your hair growth. Along with hair mask makes your hair easy and manageable to comb through. With a fresh lasting smell. The individuals that I have shared this product with, love's the silky soft feeling of their hair once blown dry and seriously love the way they're hair has grown. And I can not argue because I feel the same way. I just could not believe it at first. I will use nothing else on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Booker

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a non-toxic shampoo and after reading Maple Holistic Argan Oil Shampoo’s high reviews on Amazon I decided to give it a shot. Having used my 2nd bottle now I can confirm that this product works beautifully. My hair is naturally on the dry side and this shampoo has really helped tame the frizziness of my hair. I also use Maple Holistics' Silk 18 Conditioner. This combo makes my hair feel much softer and gives it a natural shine. I highly recommend Argan Oil Shampoo by itself or as a combo with Silk 18 Conditioner!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Feels Good, Which is Nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know why I bought this; the $4 shampoo has always sufficed. But, I guess I wanted to treat myself. This has not made me more popular with the ladies, wittier or stronger. But, it feels good during application and makes my hair (wavy/curly; a little long) look good. I think. Not really an expert on good looking hair. Perhaps I'll ask my stylist during my next cut. Anyway, I don't really have any hair afflictions (falling out, greasy, dandruff, etc.) so I can't speak to that but I would recommend this to anyone looking to upgrade their mane treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Maier

customer_reviews.title: Great for color treated hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Argan shampoo I have ever used! I color my hair and this shampoo keeps the color vibrant and keeps it from washing out. I alternate between this and the Maple Holistics Sage shampoo which has done wonders for my damaged hair!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo leaves my hair smooth and very shiny. I use it with the conditioner and together they are the best product I have used for my hair. It also feels great to use a natural product instead of others full of all kinds of chemicals. I have recommended it to several people already.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Leaves hair squeaky clean, literally
customer_reviews.text: Love that this shampoo is sulfate and paraben free. Has very subtle scent, which I like, and lathers up quickly with just a quarter size amount. The bottle size is relatively small for the price, but a little goes a long way. I’ve been using it for a week now and my hair literally squeaks as I clean it. I can tell that the residue from past shampoos and conditioners is being removed. My hair feels silkier too. I have been using it with the conditioner by the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: BEST shampoo of all.
customer_reviews.text: I;'ve been using this since the end of March. Yesterday, my hairdresser asked me what shampoo I've been using, as my hair seemed to have improved in texture and volume. This is definitely the best shampoo I've ever used. I also love that it's toxin-free and not tested on animals. (I see that someone mentioned people getting offers for free products in return for reviews..... I don't remember any such offers, I'm just giving it five stars because I think it's terrific. But everyone's hair is different. This one happens to work well for mine.)
customer_reviews.author: M. Giesecke

customer_reviews.title: New bottles all have half the thickness. Nice way to double profit I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Latest three bottles seem to be half as thick as the previous purchases I made. This tells me there is half as much in each bottle with extra water added to fill the volume. Previous bottles were great. If the old thickness does not return, then I will stop buying this product because it doubles the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My hair is the healthiest it has been
customer_reviews.text: I had extremely unhealthy, thinning, hair. I discussed this with my hairdresser, and she recommended that I try all-natural products. I looked on amazon and bought this shampoo and haven't used anything else since! It has been three years now and my hair is so healthy! I use both the shampoo and conditioner and love both.
customer_reviews.author: Carolain Fleischer

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair amazing soft
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a bunch of maple holistic hair care products. I have been impressed with everyone that I have used from the tea tree to the argan. The fact that the products are cruelty free mean everything too me. I would highly their hair care products as well as their lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Smells and cleans great, doesn’t make hair waxy or dry
customer_reviews.text: When I switched to this shampoo, people started commenting that my hair smells great. It makes my hair feel great too. It’s not too drying or irritating, unlike some shampoos that make me itchy and give me flakes. It’s also high quality in the sense that it doesn’t make my hair feel waxy over time. I just wish it were a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stopol

customer_reviews.title: Bad response from company
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 22 year old college student that wrote a review for shampoo. that's says more than anything else I can say about this shampoo, this is my 3rd bottle I have purchased haven't used any other product since finding this one. Update: Got 3rd bottle in mail finally opened it, and got a water downed version of shampoo, contacted company and got a damn coupon code.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Started using this shampoo after finishing chemo. On my second bottle, should never have ordered another. My hair came back nicely with this after chemo, but is now thinning and I am unhappy with the dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Merkel

customer_reviews.title: Argan  shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My friend ordered this product and she used it and loved it. Since her hair sheds a lot this shampoo made A miracle on her hair. I have the same problem my hair sheds a lot and I use this shampoo for a month and 99% of the shedding has been gone and my hair is growing back in I am very very satisfied with this product I also got the conditioner as well I will order the rest of my life and I will recommend for people has a less growth or shedding they should definitely use this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Argan oil shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My sister has long, highlighted, wavy hair. Recently, she was complaining of her unruly and damaged hair due to highlights as well as huge hair fall. She tried so many different hair products, including the brand names, but there were of no good. I was browsing in the amazon doing hair products research while I came up with Argon oil sulfate-free shampoo and its wonderful reviews. I was so convinced with the results that I ordered one for my sister. You can't believe it, it's wonderful. Just after the first usage, her hair felt smooth and silky. This shampoo has such an extraordinary effect, that she suggested it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Ali Tavabi

customer_reviews.title: No additives
customer_reviews.text: I liked for the reasons you like a good shampoo with benefits! It's clean and it your hair feels good afterward. I like Argan products a lot, can be trusted. Thank you for the chance to put it out there!
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: After reading ALL of the reviews, I was hoping this would be the miracle product I was hoping for. Unfortunately, my hair is quite damaged from swimming & bleaching. I still had a good bit of much more manageable frizz, however, I did not get the same results as some of the other users. This product might work better for people with definitively curly or straight hair. My hair is in between & just a mess! This would be good for an intermediate shampoo/conditioner, but it wasn't the miracle I was seeking.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Argan shampoos and this is by far the best yet! The smell is so clean and fresh and my hair feels like silk! Some Argan shampoos leave your hair feeling weighted down, but not this one! It is for sure my new fav! Product arrived on time and as described! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Good natural shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Been using this shampoo for over a month now. I have dark wavy hair. Here are my observations: - This shampoo does not help with dandruff (expected). - If you apply oil to your hair before the shampoo, you might have to use the product twice (Lather, rinse & repeat). - Seems like it will last a long time. A little goes a long way. - Natural. - Lathers well and does not wash out color that quickly. - Has a very light, pleasant smell. Other than that, I did not see much of a difference in my hair. My main concern for shifting to Natural shampoos was hair loss. Did not help in that.
customer_reviews.author: Sru

customer_reviews.title: Árgan shampoo is lugerious
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my fine hair feels after washing and conditioning with argan Maple Holistics. The smell is awesome too. The shampoo lasts a long time as it doesn’t take much to shampoo my hair.
customer_reviews.author: jphill

customer_reviews.title: My Hair Stopped Falling Out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo because I consistently use a dye that's very pretty but has made my hair brittle over the past few years. I started to panic because there were more and more hairs accumulating in the drain each time I took a shower, and I was afraid I was going bald! But when I started to use this shampoo my hair became so strong and thick that now both the shower drain and my hair-brush stay clear. In addition to making it smell nice and look shiny, this shampoo helps my hair stay in my head :-) I was pleased and amazed. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I do like this shampoo for many reasons. It has a very nice smell, not overpowering, not a chemical smell, just fresh and soothing. It can be used by a man or a woman. I love how it does not contain nasty chemicals as well! It's not a miracle fix for my difficult thin fly away hair, but I don't know if there really is such a thing. For the price I think it is a product worth buying again and again!
customer_reviews.author: rshallow

customer_reviews.title: Argan  Oil review
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product for one reason only - to improve the quality of my hair, and it did more than that. my hair felt soft after each use; my scalp was cleaner and my hair felt thicker. i must admit i was using another product with this one. bottom line, i felt that it did what it promised. i would recommend it to anyone. in my view it is rated 4.5 star overall.
customer_reviews.author: marcus79humtum

customer_reviews.title: Increased scalp itchiness
customer_reviews.text: Even though it says dandruff shampoo, it has made my scalp itchier after use. I don't particularly notice any improvement in moisture or volume of my hair so far, but I have to stop using this because of the itching. I do have oily hair and this does not help. I've tried Maple Holistics Sage Shampoo for Anti Dandruff and that works well, so I'll go back to using that.
customer_reviews.author: Gtree

customer_reviews.title: Very silky
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is rich and thick. Don't need a lot to shampoo hair. Good value for the price. This bottle should last a long time (short hair) but will reorder. Leaves hair silky smooth and alive!
customer_reviews.author: Claudette S

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Shampoo for Controling Frizzy Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my shoulder-length curly hair that frizzes, especially in the hot summer months that cause my hair to frizz out of control. It is a smaller bottle but it is effective and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very curly and I felt that this product did a great job at cleaning my hair. I enjoyed this shampoo but I felt that it was slightly runny compared to shampoos I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: MissLyssa

customer_reviews.title: It's all about the ingredients for me...
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find products (that work!) in line with my values!!! When I decided to give a try to this shampoo, I was prepared to be disappointed once again. To my surprise it actually kept its promises! After a loss in my family, my hair just started to fall and lose their shine. My scalp was itchy all the time and I felt depressed. Now that my hair looks to its original self, it's one less thing to worry about! The fact that this product is natural and cruelty-free is cherry on top !
customer_reviews.author: chrystele

customer_reviews.title: Mild enjoyable scent, lots of lather.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a group of items to care for my hair and scalp. I am having circulation issues which cause all sorts of things including hair loss. I am using this plus a scalp oil and massage daily. I will update this once I have time to review its long term benefits. Update: 5/12/19 the first thing you experience with this shampoo is the scent. It’s unlike any other scent, it’s smooth and soothing. The texture is just as smooth, and upon rinsing, your hair is equally soft. I have been using this shampoo for a couple of years now and I don’t buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sage B
